parameters.jsCode:
const webhook = items[0].json;
const inputData = webhook.body || webhook;

const currentTime = new Date();
const currentTimeISO = currentTime.toISOString();

const monitoringData = {
    recordId: `${inputData.sessionId}_${Date.now()}`,
    recordTimestamp: currentTimeISO,
    session_id: inputData.sessionId,
    user_id: inputData.userId,
    user_name: inputData.userName,
    config_name: inputData.configName,
    platform: inputData.platform,
    timestamp: currentTimeISO,
    session_start_time: currentTimeISO,
    last_activity_time: currentTimeISO,
    session_duration: inputData.sessionDuration || 0,
    event_type: inputData.eventType || 'activity',
    message_count: inputData.messageCount || 0,
    current_language: inputData.currentLanguage || 'ru',
    is_minimized: inputData.isMinimized || false,
    user_agent: inputData.userAgent || '',
    screen_resolution: inputData.screenResolution || '',
    language: inputData.language || '',
    timezone: inputData.timezone || '',
    referrer: inputData.referrer || '',
    current_url: inputData.currentUrl || '',
    domain: inputData.domain || '',
    geo_ip: inputData.geo?.ip || 'Unknown',
    geo_country: inputData.geo?.country || 'Unknown',
    geo_city: inputData.geo?.city || 'Unknown',
    geo_region: inputData.geo?.region || 'Unknown',
    geo_latitude: inputData.geo?.latitude || null,
    geo_longitude: inputData.geo?.longitude || null
};

return [{json: monitoringData}];

parameters.query:
-- ğŸ—„ï¸ Ğ¢ĞĞ‘Ğ›Ğ˜Ğ¦Ğ: {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Save').item.json.table_monitoring }}

INSERT INTO {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Save').item.json.table_monitoring }} (
    record_id, record_timestamp, session_id, user_id, user_name,
    config_name, platform, timestamp, session_start_time, 
    last_activity_time, session_duration, event_type, message_count,
    current_language, is_minimized, user_agent, screen_resolution,
    language, timezone, referrer, current_url, domain,
    geo_ip, geo_country, geo_city, geo_region, geo_latitude, geo_longitude
)
VALUES (
    '{{ $json.recordId }}',
    '{{ $json.recordTimestamp }}',
    '{{ $json.session_id }}',
    '{{ $json.user_id }}',
    '{{ $json.user_name }}',
    '{{ $json.config_name }}',
    '{{ $json.platform }}',
    '{{ $json.timestamp }}',
    '{{ $json.session_start_time }}',
    '{{ $json.last_activity_time }}',
    {{ $json.session_duration }},
    '{{ $json.event_type }}',
    {{ $json.message_count }},
    '{{ $json.current_language }}',
    {{ $json.is_minimized }},
    '{{ $json.user_agent }}',
    '{{ $json.screen_resolution }}',
    '{{ $json.language }}',
    '{{ $json.timezone }}',
    '{{ $json.referrer }}',
    '{{ $json.current_url }}',
    '{{ $json.domain }}',
    '{{ $json.geo_ip }}',
    '{{ $json.geo_country }}',
    '{{ $json.geo_city }}',
    '{{ $json.geo_region }}',
    {{ $json.geo_latitude || 'NULL' }},
    {{ $json.geo_longitude || 'NULL' }}
)
ON CONFLICT (session_id) 
DO UPDATE SET
    config_name = EXCLUDED.config_name,
    platform = EXCLUDED.platform,
    last_activity_time = EXCLUDED.last_activity_time,
    session_duration = EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (EXCLUDED.last_activity_time::timestamp - {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Save').item.json.table_monitoring }}.session_start_time::timestamp))::integer,
    message_count = {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Save').item.json.table_monitoring }}.message_count,
    current_language = EXCLUDED.current_language,
    is_minimized = EXCLUDED.is_minimized,
    geo_ip = EXCLUDED.geo_ip,
    geo_country = EXCLUDED.geo_country,
    geo_city = EXCLUDED.geo_city,
    geo_region = EXCLUDED.geo_region,
    geo_latitude = EXCLUDED.geo_latitude,
    geo_longitude = EXCLUDED.geo_longitude,
    event_type = EXCLUDED.event_type,
    user_id = CASE 
        WHEN {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Save').item.json.table_monitoring }}.user_id IS NULL OR {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Save').item.json.table_monitoring }}.user_id = '' 
        THEN EXCLUDED.user_id 
        ELSE {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Save').item.json.table_monitoring }}.user_id 
    END,
    user_name = CASE 
        WHEN {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Save').item.json.table_monitoring }}.user_name IS NULL OR {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Save').item.json.table_monitoring }}.user_name = '' 
        THEN EXCLUDED.user_name 
        ELSE {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Save').item.json.table_monitoring }}.user_name 
    END
RETURNING *;

-- ğŸ—„ï¸ Ğ¢ĞĞ‘Ğ›Ğ˜Ğ¦Ğ«: {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Sessions').item.json.table_monitoring }}, {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Sessions').item.json.table_chat_ru }}, {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Sessions').item.json.table_chat_en }}

WITH real_message_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        session_id,
        COUNT(*) as real_count,
        array_agg(created_at ORDER BY created_at) as message_timestamps
    FROM (
        SELECT session_id, created_at FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Sessions').item.json.table_chat_ru }}
        UNION ALL
        SELECT session_id, created_at FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Sessions').item.json.table_chat_en }}
    ) all_messages
    GROUP BY session_id
),
session_stats AS (
    SELECT 
        wm.session_id,
        MIN(wm.session_start_time) as session_start,
        MAX(wm.last_activity_time) as last_activity,
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (MAX(wm.last_activity_time) - MIN(wm.session_start_time)))::integer as duration,
        COALESCE(rmc.real_count, 0) as messages,
        COALESCE(rmc.message_timestamps, ARRAY[]::timestamp[]) as message_timestamps,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.user_id) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as user_id,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.user_name) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as user_name,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.config_name) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as config_name,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.current_language) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as language,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.geo_ip) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as ip,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.geo_country) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as country,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.geo_city) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as city,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.user_agent) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as user_agent,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.referrer) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as referrer,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.domain) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as domain,
        FIRST_VALUE(wm.platform) OVER (PARTITION BY wm.session_id ORDER BY wm.timestamp) as platform
    FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Sessions').item.json.table_monitoring }} wm
    LEFT JOIN real_message_counts rmc ON wm.session_id = rmc.session_id
    WHERE wm.last_activity_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
        AND wm.user_id IS NOT NULL 
        AND wm.user_id != ''
        AND wm.user_id != 'undefined'
    GROUP BY wm.session_id, wm.timestamp, wm.user_id, wm.user_name, wm.config_name, 
             wm.current_language, wm.geo_ip, wm.geo_country, wm.geo_city, wm.user_agent, 
             wm.referrer, wm.domain, wm.platform, rmc.real_count, rmc.message_timestamps
)
SELECT DISTINCT ON (session_id) 
    *,
    CASE 
        WHEN last_activity > NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes' THEN 'active'
        ELSE 'inactive'
    END as status
FROM session_stats
ORDER BY session_id, last_activity DESC;

-- ğŸ—„ï¸ Ğ¢ĞĞ‘Ğ›Ğ˜Ğ¦Ğ«: {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Dialogs').item.json.table_chat_ru }}, {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Dialogs').item.json.table_chat_en }}

WITH all_chats AS (
    SELECT 
        id,
        session_id,
        message::json->>'type' as message_type,
        message::json->>'content' as content,
        created_at as timestamp,
        platform,
        'ru' as language
    FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Dialogs').item.json.table_chat_ru }}
    WHERE session_id = '{{ $json.session_id }}'

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        id,
        session_id,
        message::json->>'type' as message_type,
        message::json->>'content' as content,
        created_at as timestamp,
        platform,
        'en' as language
    FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Dialogs').item.json.table_chat_en }}
    WHERE session_id = '{{ $json.session_id }}'
)
SELECT * FROM all_chats
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

-- ğŸ—„ï¸ Ğ¢ĞĞ‘Ğ›Ğ˜Ğ¦Ğ«: {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Contacts').item.json.table_contacts }}, {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Contacts').item.json.table_monitoring }}

SELECT 
    ucd.session_id,
    ucd.full_name,
    ucd.first_name,
    ucd.last_name,
    ucd.phone,
    ucd.phone_raw,
    ucd.email,
    ucd.telegram,
    ucd.whatsapp,
    ucd.instagram,
    ucd.other_contacts,
    ucd.company,
    ucd.position,
    ucd.location,
    ucd.preferred_contact,
    ucd.confidence_score,
    ucd.extracted_from,
    ucd.last_updated
FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Contacts').item.json.table_contacts }} ucd
WHERE ucd.session_id IN (
    SELECT DISTINCT session_id 
    FROM {{ $('âš™ï¸ CONFIG - Contacts').item.json.table_monitoring }} 
    WHERE last_activity_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
);
